testFakeBrokerURINonRmiregistryConnectPubForOverlay

public void testFakeBrokerURINonRmiregistryConnectPubForOverlay()
                                                         throws java.io.IOException
Test for exception that the remoteBroker of OVERLAY-CONNECT command is fake, where the port number is fake. It is important to note that port 1100 is not rmiregistry.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

testFakeBrokerURIRmiregistryConnectPubForOverlay

public void testFakeBrokerURIRmiregistryConnectPubForOverlay()
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
Test for exception that the remoteBroker of OVERLAY-CONNECT command is right, however, no brokerCore instance initialized at there. It is important to note that port 1098 is rmiregistry already

testConnectItselfPubForOverlay

public void testConnectItselfPubForOverlay()
                                    throws java.io.IOException
Test for exception that the remoteBroker of OVERLAY-CONNECT command is broker itself. It is important to note that this will cause a loop, and the routing will be wrong totally.

Throws:
java.io.IOException
